solution_line_template: The cost of the apples was ${total_cost_oranges} / {cheaper_factor} = $<<{total_cost_oranges}/{cheaper_factor}={cost_of_apples_total}>>{cost_of_apples_total}.

When the cost of {quantity_apples_kg} kg of apples was ${cost_of_apples_total}, then the cost of 1 kg of apples was ${cost_of_apples_total} / {quantity_apples_kg} kg = $<<{cost_of_apples_total}/{quantity_apples_kg}={cost_per_kg_apples}>>{cost_per_kg_apples}/kg.
